fields.name: ContainedResources
fields.description: The azure resources that will be contained within the solutions. They will be locked and gets deleted automatically when the solution is deleted.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: The provisioning state for the solution.

fields.name: ReferencedResources
fields.description: The resources that will be referenced from this solution. Deleting any of those solution out of band will break the solution.

fields.name: WorkspaceResourceId
fields.description: The azure resourceId for the workspace where the solution will be deployed/enabled.
